name: Calligraphy: A Line-Drawing Creativity Brain-Teaser
description:
Calligraphy is a unique game where you let your imagination run free to solve intriguing puzzles. Puzzles get harder and harder and requires you to really think and be creative!

The goal is simple: draw a line that touches all the colored circles while avoiding the white circles en route. Multiple solutions that range from delightfully simple to exceptionally deep and complex exists for each level.

FEATURES:
• Beautiful flat and minimal design
• Incredibly appealing and clever gameplay
• Includes 50 amazing levels with increasing difficulty
• Simple but challenging gameplay!

Whether you're looking for the next viral game or just looking for a fun time-waster, this game is for you! Download it today!
